text: Antonino Cuffaro (21 April 1932 – 20 July 2019) was an Italian politician. He was born in Sambuca di Sicilia, Italy. Cuffaro was a member of the Italian Parliament from 1976 to 1987 and again from 1994 to 1996. He was a member of the Italian Communist Party. Cuffaro died on 20 July 2019 in Trieste, Italy at the age of 87.Morto Antonino Cuffaro, esponente del Pci e della Trieste ‘scientifica’ ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:Italian communists
title: Antonino Cuffaro
